attributes.action: adopt the "GB" measurement system as the standard unit of measurement for all things larger than 12cm in length, breadth etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The GB measurement system is as follows:-

19.3cm to a GB
193m, or 100GBs to a kGB

All things smaller than 1GB will be measured in 6ths of a GB.

All things with a measurement of 44GBs will be painted orange to warn the French.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
